sqlMap.insert: insert into notice (notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_expiredate, notice_active) values (notice_no_seq.nextval, #title#, #content#, #expiredate#, #active#)
sqlMap.select: select "no" as no, "title" as title, "content" as content, "regdate" as regdate, "expiredate" as expiredate, "active" as active from (select row_number() over (order by notice_no asc) m, notice_no as "no", notice_title as "title", notice_content as "content", notice_regdate as "regdate", notice_expiredate as "expiredate", notice_active as "active" from notice) where m >= #beginIndex# and m <= #endIndex#
sqlMap.update: update notice set notice_active = 'N' where notice_no = #value#
sqlMap.select: select notice_no as no, notice_title as title, notice_content as content, notice_regdate as regdate, notice_expiredate as expiredate, notice_active as active from notice where notice_no = #value#
